text: agar khairaat ko zaahir mein do to yah (zaahir karake dena) bhee achchha hai aur agar usako chhipao aur haajatamandon ko do to ye chhipa kar dena tumhaare haq mein jyaada behatar hai aur aise dene ko khuda tumhaare gunaahon ka kaphfaara kar dega aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usase khabaradaar hai
